duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement a comprehensive e-commerce strategy aligned with business goals and objectives.
Lead the creation, implementation, and optimization of e-commerce campaigns across various platforms.
Monitor campaign performance daily, analyze data, and identify areas for improvement.
Oversee the planning and execution of digital advertising campaigns, including paid search, display advertising, social media advertising, and re-marketing efforts.
Work with the marketing team to create and optimize Shopify and Facebook selling sites and landing page designs.
Utilize web analytics tools to extract insights, generate reports, and provide actionable recommendations to improve campaign performance.
Develop and manage budgets for e-commerce and online marketing initiatives.
Lead a team of e-commerce and online marketing professionals, providing guidance, mentoring, and support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. Advanced degree is a plus.
